title: Product Rule
text: Apply the product rule that $$\ln\left(xy\right)=\ln\left(x\right)+\ln\left(y\right)$$ to combine the two logarithms on the left hand side of the equals sign.

title: Distribute Constant
text: Distribute the constant of $$2$$ to both terms in $$3x-5$$ within the logarithm to simplify.

title: Inverse of Logarithm
text: The inverse of a logarithm is the exponent of the logarithm base.

title: Cancelling out Log
text: What is the equation when the logarithm is cancelled with exponentiation of $$2$$ to both sides?

title: Undo Exponent
text: To undo the exponent, calculate the value and simplify.

title: Isolating $$x$$
text: To solve, move the $$x$$ term to one side and all the other terms to the other side.
